sandra.libs.dm.multimodalformfilllib
Class Field

java.lang.Object
  sandra.libs.dm.multimodalformfilllib.Field
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLAsyncResponse
public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLAsyncResponse

Represents a field in a dialogue. Contains the relevant information for processing a piece of information: name of the piece of information (e.g. destination), sentence used to prompt the user for it (e.g. "What is your destination?), the valid responses, and the sentences used if the system does not understand or does not hear what the user said (e.g. "I did not understand" / "I could not hear you". Also it contains the information provided by the user to fill the field (e.g. Paris). It is a version of the class sandra.libs.dm.formfilllib.Field (chapter 5, FormFillLib project). Changes: grammar attribute, methods retrieveGrammar, setGrammar, isvalid, and processXMLContents.

Version:
1.3, 08/18/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear

public boolean isComplete()
A field is complete if the prompt and name are not null, and thus it is possible to ask the user for the field.

setGrammar

public void setGrammar(java.lang.String uri,
                       android.content.Context ctx)
Sets the NLU grammar for the current field.

Parameters:
uri - URL to the xml file containing the grammar.
ctx - Context of the application. It is necessary in order to access the assets folder.
See Also:
format for the grammar in chapter 6.

retrieveGrammar

private void retrieveGrammar(java.lang.String location,
                             android.content.Context ctx)
Starts the retrieval of the NLU grammar from the specified location. If the location is an URL, it access the Internet, if not, it tries to read it from the assets folder. When it is done, the processXMLContents method is invoked.

Parameters:
location - URL or path in the assets folder for the grammar file.
ctx - Context of the application. It is necessary in order to access the assets folder.

getContentFromAssets

private java.lang.String getContentFromAssets(java.lang.String filename,
                                              android.content.Context ctx)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
Reads a file from the assets folder.

Parameters:
filename - Path inside the assets folder.
Returns:
File contents.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If it is not possible to read the specified file.

processXMLContents

public void processXMLContents(java.lang.String XMLGrammarContent)
Initializes the HandCraftedGrammar with the xml read. It is invoked when the retrieveGrammar finishes processing. If the grammar cannot be initialized, then it is not considered.

Specified by:
processXMLContents in interface XMLAsyncResponse

isvalid

public java.lang.Boolean isvalid(java.lang.String phrase)
Checks whether a phrase recognized to fill the current field is valid according to the NLU grammar considered.

Returns:
True if there is no grammar or the grammar could not be used, or if there is grammar and the phrase matches it. False when the phrase does not match the grammar.
